member.name: M:DGDKPlugins.CDarkGDK.InitDarkGDK
member.summary: Initializes the DarkGDK.NET system, and is primarily used by CSharp applications

member.name: M:DGDKPlugins.CDarkGDK.GetDarkGDKGlobals
member.summary: Returns a reference to the CDGDKGlobals class

member.name: T:DGDKPlugins.CDarkGDK
member.summary: The CDarkGDK class is used by DarkGDK.NET applications for initializing the DarkGDK.NET toolkit

member.name: T:DGDKPlugins.CDGDKPlugin
member.summary: The CDGDKPlugin is used by external DarkGDK.NET plugins so that they may access the functons and classes through one single point interface.

member.name: T:DGDKPlugins.CDGDKGlobals
member.summary: The CDGDKGlobals class is used to maintain references to all of the DarkGDK.NET classes for access by plugins and applications
